rows.label: bf03030100_0010
rows.name: What is that?

rows.label: bf03030100_0020
rows.name: A Cloud Sea compass.

rows.label: bf03030100_0030
rows.name:
A must-have for salvagers.
It's sort of a map of the Cloud Sea.

rows.label: bf03030100_0040
rows.name: If you do this... And this...

rows.label: bf03030100_0050
rows.name: What's the date today?

rows.label: bf03030100_0060
rows.name:
Um...
It's September 5th, 4058 in the Divine Calendar.

rows.label: bf03030100_0070
rows.name: Okay! So now we put the date in...

rows.label: bf03030100_0080
rows.name: See?

rows.label: bf03030100_0090
rows.name: This is very clever.

rows.label: bf03030100_0100
rows.name:
Looks like Gula is the closest
country to the World Tree right now.

rows.label: bf03030100_0110
rows.name: All we need is a ship...

rows.label: bf03030100_0120
rows.name: The army has every ship in town in its grip.

rows.label: bf03030100_0130
rows.name: *sigh* We're kinda stuck...

rows.label: bf03030100_0140
rows.name: Seems that way.

rows.label: bf03030100_0150
rows.name: Sorry I'm no use now...

rows.label: bf03030100_0160
rows.name:
I know, I know.
But I'm all out of ideas.

rows.label: bf03030100_0170
rows.name:
Boss need ship?
Tora have good idea!

rows.label: bf03030100_0180
rows.name: You do?

rows.label: bf03030100_0190
rows.name:
There is ship builder living
at Gula Divine Beast's bum-bum!

rows.label: bf03030100_0200
rows.name:
Old friend of Tora's Grampypon.
He called Umon!

rows.label: bf03030100_0210
rows.name: Maybe he help if we tell him what's what!

rows.label: bf03030100_0220
rows.name:
Sure, it's worth a shot!
Let's get going.
